system.description: Effect: The user reduces their HP by 50% of their Max HP. Then, they gain +12 ATK stages for 5 activations. If the user's current HP is less than or equal to 1/2 of their Max HP, this attack fails.

actions.name: Belly Drum
actions.description: Effect: The user reduces their HP by 50% of their Max HP. Then, they gain +12 ATK stages for 5 activations. If the user's current HP is less than or equal to 1/2 of their Max HP, this attack fails.
